page.title: 08INDUSTRY.EMPLOYMENT
page.content: ON SATURDAY MORNING A GROUP OF THREE GIRLS FROM THIS SCHOOL WENT TO NORTHERN PRESS_KNIFE.WHEN WE ENTERED THE FACTORY WE WERE SURPRISED TO SEE HOW LARGE IT WAS.WE WENT TO LOOK AROUND THE FACTORY.THE FIRST ROOM WE ENTERED WAS VERY NOISY.THERE WERE TWO MEN BENDING METAL AND FOUR MEN WELDING PIECES OF METAL TOGETHER.WE HAD A TRY ON A FEW MACHINES.THE MACHINES WE WENT ON PUNCHED OUT DIFFERENT SIZES AND KINDS OF SHAPES OUT.IN THE NEXT ROOM WERE MACHINES WHICH MADE AND REPAIRED CUTTING PADS.WE THEN ASKED OUR QUESTIONS WHILE DRINKING SOME ORANGE JUICE.WE WERE ALL GIVEN A PEN.NORTHERN PRESS_KNIFE EMPLOYS ABOUT 30 PEOPLE FROM GT.HARWOOD AND DISTRICT AND MAKES PRODUCTS WHICH ARE USED BY THE FOLLOWING INDUSTRIES MOTOR,SHOE,TOY,CLOTHING,LEATHER, CARPETS PACKING ETC
